sentences.cn: ...一件浅金色薄得几乎透明的裙子。

sentences.en: Hence the rainforest's high level of humidity , visible from the observation tower in diaphanous cloudletscanopy.
sentences.cn: 所以,雨林的空气十分湿润, 从观测站望去,山林笼罩着薄薄的云.

sentences.en: She was wearing a dress of diaphanous silk.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件薄如蝉翼的绸服。

sentences.en: The breeze rustled leaves in a dry and diaphanous distance.
sentences.cn: 远处,空气干燥而明净,微风吹拂着树叶发出沙沙的声音.

trans.tran_en: diaphanous cloth is so thin that you can almost see through it
